title: army
description: Defines a distinct army type, from which single entity instances are generated in game.

health.description: The base number of successful attacks any instance of this unit type can suffer before dying.

id.description: Unique id for a particular instance of this type.

intrinsics.description: Permanent effects on this specific unit instance at birth.

movementSpeed.description: The number of squares per turn this unit can move over ideal terrain.

name.description: Descriptive, display name for this type of army.

examples: Vorgoth the Timid, Destroyer of Lint Bunnies

statuses.description: Longer term effects inflicted on this specific unit instance beyond birth.

strength.description: Base, unmodified attack/defense strength of the unit.
